title: Balinese surfer
creator_credit: Survival Films, Tony Dutton and Bill Leimbach
brief_description: Shows how the younger generation on the island of Bali have overcome the traditional Balinese fear of the sea to excel in the sport of surfing. Also explains the Balinese attitude to religion and how it is absorbed into every facet of their lives, especially their art and dancing.
